title: DPRK - Squirrel and Hedgehog (Full Series)
description: Seeded by kekd Please consider donating BTC: 13nFV1nHwgzmvqT4aUUxEGD5gqt7mVFXej To help pay the seedbox monthly fee! ---------------------------------------------------------------------- What is this? Squirrel and Hedgehog is a North Korean cartoon produced by SEK Studio and shown on KCTV, North Korea's public TV station. Although meant for kids, the series has a great deal of graphic violence and adult language. The show has had a discontinuous production and the style has developed over the years. This torrent includes all 32 original episodes of the series and is in Korean with no subtitles. In early 2015, Mondo Films started adapting the first season into at least English (as Brave Soldier) and Spanish (as Soldados Valientes), with some of the more violent scenes removed. All the 26 Spanish-dubbed episodes were uploaded onto Mondo's Youtube account. This torrent also includes the first episode of 'Brave Soldier.' ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Plot: The series follow a conflict between communities of anthropomorphic animals living in an unspecified country. The majoirty of episodes follow the adventure of Geumsaegi, a Flower Hill squirrel fighting for good in a war against evil. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- http://www.imdb.com/title/tt5404966/
